config.description: Message displayed when the player starts a battle.
config.defaultValue: Step right up! The big top battle is here, and I'm about to juggle your dreams of victory! Let's make this a show to remember!

config.description: Message displayed when the NPC is defeated.
config.defaultValue: Whoops — down goes the clown! Guess the joke's on me… But hey, every show must end! You win this round, kid—now go steal the spotlight!
